text: The 2018–19 Biathlon World Cup – Stage 5 was the fifth event of the season and was held in Ruhpolding, Germany, from 17–20 January 2019. == Schedule of events == The events took place at the following times. {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" width="420" |- ! Date ! Time !
